sentences.simplifiedText: 我委托他处理这个问题。
sentences.traditionalText: 我委託他處理這個問題。
sentences.pinyin: wǒ wěi tuō tā chǔ lǐ zhè gè wèn tí.
sentences.translation: I entrust him to handle this problem.

sentences.simplifiedText: 由于我不能亲自到场，所以我委托律师代表我出席。
sentences.traditionalText: 由於我不能親自到場，所以我委託律師代表我出席。
sentences.pinyin: yóu yú wǒ bù néng qīn zì dào chǎng, suǒ yǐ wǒ wěi tuō lǜ shī dài biǎo wǒ chū xí.
sentences.translation: Since I can't be there in person, I entrust a lawyer to represent me.

sentences.simplifiedText: 我被公司委托来做这个项目。
sentences.traditionalText: 我被公司委託來做這個項目。
sentences.pinyin: wǒ bèi gōngsī wěituō lái zuò zhège xiàngmù.
sentences.translation: I am commissioned by the company to do this project.

sentences.simplifiedText: 由于他的专业素质和卓越的领导能力，总裁委托他负责这个重大项目。
sentences.traditionalText: 由於他的專業素質和卓越的領導能力，總裁委託他負責這個重大項目。
sentences.pinyin: yóuyú tā de zhuānyè sùzhí hé zhuó yuè de lǐngdǎo nénglì, zǒngcái wěituō tā fùzé zhège zhòngdà xiàngmù.
sentences.translation: Due to his professional qualities and outstanding leadership ability, the president commissioned him to be in charge of this major project.
